roleset.name: to shape into a cup or cup-like formation

example.name: Simple transitive
example.text: He cupped the leaves together and drank from them.

example.name: With location
example.text: She cupped his hands around her waist.

roleset.note: CUP-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB and sense groupings. No appropriate VN entry for this roleset. Framed by Claire. (from cup.01-v)

roleset.name: to place in a cup

example.name: Romance novel type usage
example.text: He cupped her jaw, his thumb tracing her cheek.

example.name: With location, cup itself
example.text: He cupped the egg in his hands.

roleset.note: CUP-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel additions to VN, PB and sense groupings. VN entry pocket-9.10. Framed by Claire. (from cup.02-v)

roleset.name: applying suction cups to the body

example.name: Light verb
example.text: Jeanette was complaining about Myrriah-1 charging *PRO*-1 to do facial cupping since she 's barely educated but I think why not ? I told Jeanette that Myrriah can charge a lot because Myrruah is like a spa embodied .

roleset.note: CUPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from cupping.01-n)
